Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet with a rounded conical base, slightly restricted mouth and simple lip. The surface is uneven and dented. Both surfaces bear traces of a pale red slip under which the actual surface colour varies from beige to dark brown. The inside has been simply polished. The outside bears traces of a heavy horizontal burnish, the gloss of which has almost entirely disappeared.
